wikipedia_page.main: Dean Clark (born 31 March 1980) is a retired footballer. He was originally a professional who made a handful of appearances for Brentford and then went on to play for a variety of teams local to north and west London, including making over one hundred appearances for Northwood.

response: *Dean Clark (ice hockey) (born 1964), ice hockey player and manager
*Dean Clark (footballer) (born 1980), semi-pro footballer for Northwood F.C. and currently Slough Town F.C.
*Dean Clark (rugby league) (born 1968), former New Zealand international
